inclusion.criterion: serologic evidence of chronic hepatitis C infection by an anti-HCV antibody test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative urine or blood pregnancy test (for women of childbearing potential)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all fertile males and females receiving Copegus must be using two forms of effective contraception during treatment and during the 6 months after treatment end
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: all patients should have insulin resistance (>2.1) determined by the homeostasis model
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: women with ongoing pregnancy or breast feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: therapy with any systemic anti-neoplastic or immunomodulatory treatment (including supraphysiologic doses of steroids and radiation) < 6 months prior to the first dose of study drug
exclusion.label: unknown
